page.title: 02Alyth Perthshire
page.content: The main industry is agriculture of which the prime crop is soft fruit with potatoes and cereal and cattle and sheep rearing sharing in that order.This year great tracts of land were painted a bright yellow with the flower of Oil Seed Rape. The summer has been the wettest on record and the soft fruit harvest was approximately two to three weeks behind time resulting in heavy losses. The main source of the extra labour needed to pick the berries is the holidaymakers from the industrial areas who have by tradition had holidays to coincide with fruit picking the lack of flexibility of the cities' factories' holiday periods meant that labour was available at a time when the crop of fruits such as strawberries and raspberries were still not yet ripe.
